definitions.definition: A large settlement , bigger than a town ; sometimes with a specific legal definition, depending on the place.
examples: São Paulo is the largest city in South America.

definitions.definition: A settlement granted special status by royal charter or letters patent ; traditionally, a settlement with a cathedral regardless of size.
definitions.label_groups: UK , historical in Ireland and Commonwealth

examples: I'm going into the city today to do some shopping.

definitions.definition: A large amount of something ( used after the noun ) .
examples: It’s video game city in here!

main_definition: A large settlement , bigger than a town ; sometimes with a specific legal definition, depending on the place.
secondary_definitions: ( UK , historical in Ireland and Commonwealth ) A settlement granted special status by royal charter or letters patent ; traditionally, a settlement with a cathedral regardless of size.
( Australia ) The central business district ; downtown .
( slang ) A large amount of something ( used after the noun ) .
